description: Get ready for a taste of pure, unbridled action.  It's Marcus Mojo joined by the strikingly handsome Sebastian Young and luscious Trent Diesel. But Sebastian's not ending this party without enjoying Trent's eager ass too!  It's passionate, wall-to-wall intensity as these three unbelievably hot boys let their raw power and craving for flesh run wild.  Enjoy!
series: M103 - Marcus Mojo, Trent Diesel & Sebastian Young
title: Party Of Three
